replies.body:
These were so fun to draw!! I'm so happy right now!! <3

What do you guys want to see next TELL MEEEE!!
How about Braum doing the poro juggle with Gnar instead of a poro?
Or even better he goes mega gnar during the juggle and can't be juggled anymore. :P
You say that as if Braum would have any difficulty juggling Mega Gnar.
Or just do a reverse, Braum poro-juggling Gnar, then Mega Gnar poro-juggling a delighted Braum in return.

Oh my god please this would actually be the most adorable thing I've ever seen!

Also please can we see Ziggs and Gnar together, maybe have Ziggs throwing Gnar like a bomb or Gnar dive-bombing people and making explosion noises?
Or how about Ziggs doing his joke "c'mon, does this look dangerous?" and eating a bomb, then freaking out when Gnar tries to do the same thing?
Gnar sitting on Viktor's third hand! Viktor tries to throw him off but Gnar just treats it like a Disneyland Rocket Ride.
Ahahaha cuuuuute. Alright now I'm picturing a Battlecast Gnar and that is making me happy.

I loved all of these. Especially the Lee Sin and Rengar ones.

Why not do one with him mimicking Udyr.

Another of him snuggling with Ahri.

And one of them having him riding on Anavia.
{{champion:103}} {{champion:150}} Yes please snuggling with Ahri!!!!
can we have a fiddlesticks one where gnar sucks in his gut and starts walking funny
Gnar and Jinx riding a rocket weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

Members of Pentakill pranking each other while on tour please!

(P.S. Your Jayce vs. Viktor comic series is my favorite thing in the history of things)

The one with Darius is awesome!!!!
Gnar seeing {{champion:33}}  powerball and trying to replicate it!!
How about {{champion:8}} (maybe a skin of his like Nosferatu or BL) trying to scare {{champion:150}} in a first image, then Mega Gnar playing in his Blood Pool? I'm a big fan of Vladimir :D
Gnar stubs his toe on something and his rage meter fills up and he destroys whatever he stubbed himself on :D

I must not beg.
I must not beg.
I must not....

VEIGAAAAAAAR {{champion:45}}

EDIT: finished watching all the comics except the viktor one ( isave that for later ).
The Diana one is impressive! Congratulations! :D
So adorable! Very well done! I'd love to see something with {{champion:9}} ...maybe a party motif? :3

I love the expressions.

I want ones with {{champion:222}} {{champion:254}} and{{champion:51}} (totally not biased).

RITO PLS.
You can't just RITO PLS if you *ARE * RITO. get outta here~!

Oh man, these are too funny! I love the amumu one! Not to mention the artwork itself is really nice.

It would just be funny if Gnar and Soraka were like, sitting side by side on a bench or something eating bananas!

Or what if he and Nami were having a watergun fight! It would be funny if like, Gnar shot a little "pew pew" of water at nami, and the next panel Nami is summoning a giant  wave and gnar is running!!
Awesome ideas Darko!

Ok.. i'll throw in a couple of brainstorm ideas i had in my mind.. really basic stuff, im sure you can work things out with them, improve and all:

Gnar being all pop-py with {{champion:103}}  popstar
mimicking {{champion:12}} 's Q in mega form after seeing alistar going "Now im angry". Holding a small lasso on one of Ali's horn, Ali with grumpy face.
mocking blackfrost {{champion:34}} 's egg laying ability
pretending to be {{champion:1}} 's tibbers
mimicking {{champion:53}} 's walking
{{champion:51}}  trying to stop him from eating her trap's cupcakes
flying remote-controlled airplane on a race against {{champion:42}} 
{{champion:131}}  staring at the moon, gnar jumping on the moon's reflexe in a river
working out with {{champion:36}} . Or being a trainee at mundo's corp
with heaphones and chewing on {{champion:119}} 's microphone
being unaffected by {{champion:28}} 's spikes (cos he's cute and pure and good and all..)
low-budget(or toy-like) pulsefire {{champion:81}} 's equipment
showing up at {{champion:9}} 's party as a scarecrow
being a naughty student at school (on {{champion:114}} 's principal)
fishing with {{champion:105}} , he hooks fizz' shark
playing statue with {{champion:3}} 
eating all {{champion:41}} 's orange stock
playing with pool party {{champion:104}} .. or maybe turning into mega gnar in the mist of smokescreen
racing {{champion:120}}  with a toy pony
playing with {{champion:74}} 's rocket, maybe spining like heimer does.
helping forecast {{champion:40}}  in the eye of a tornado, being dragged by the wind, i dont know..
making a sand-like cataclysm with a flag (with his face on it or "i'm helping" written) in the center.. to mock {{champion:59}} 
being {{champion:24}} 's sidekick with a lampshade
flying away (stealing) {{champion:126}} 's cannon/hammer.. or with a superman-like uniform, mocking jayce's superman-like style
{{champion:222}} .... ohh.. there are so many possibilities... with the grenades exploding on both.. being friends with jinx's gun, giving her a ziggy's doll.. idk...


Round 2:

Stealing {{champion:43}} 's fans and throwing them as boomerangs (an old karma's homage), wearing her hats/tiaras
Mega gnar as Pentakill's mascot (Iron Maiden's Eddie style)
Gnar with a Cthulhu mask jumping on {{champion:38}}'s lap while he's on his throne
Giving a Lotus to {{champion:55}} , or dressed as Garen to conquer her big armor, with a head barely showing up from it (remember old garen?)
Being all angel-like (halo and wings) with {{champion:10}}, or maybe all fallen-angel-like to tease her and stealing her riot wings or aether wings
mimicking {{champion:85}} training karate
Spraying insecticide on {{champion:121}} 
making {{champion:96}} fire fireworks (like pulling his tail or something) or firing a food-gun into kog's mouth
being {{champion:7}} 's assistant on a magic trick, being half cutten or something
imitating {{champion:127}} , blindfolded, setting fire on her hair
giving {{champion:236}} a hand-made lantern with Senna's picture inside. Sort of a gift, like those kid's lampshades with spinning figures
playing catch with all {{champion:117}} 's pets (dragon, cupcake, fairy, bat, whatever)
really appreciated the idea of teasing {{champion:99}}  with a flashlight.. 2 ideas: maybe a small one just to refer.. or maybe a really big powerful one.. like a batman's call one
I know {{champion:54}} is supposed to be this really HUGE dude, but i think it would be a fun image if mega gnar misconfused malphite for his recent thrown rock, and picked him up and threw him instead! haha
playing with {{champion:57}} 's sapling, maybe playing hide-and-seek inside maokai or mistakenly being thrown instead of the sapling
im pretty you have seen this {{champion:11}} 's cosplay before: http://thebestoflol.com/upload/20140614100730uid48.jpg 
playing shooting game with {{champion:21}} or even better: a plastic dart stuck to MF's forehead, shot by gnar
eating {{champion:25}} 's cookies.. or singing with ghostbride or even marrying her! With a top hat and everything


Continues below
I
V
I especially like the one about {{champion:150}}  eating {{champion:51}} 's cupcakes.

Great

Now I hate him even more.

Stupid little prick
Here's a hug.
how about gnar and ziggs playing catch!
With a bomb?! O_O

{{champion:75}} "Eternal is my vigil. Eons pass, empires fall, once-great cities turn to dust, and still I stand watch, in timeless waiting. Nothing shall distract me from my... from my..."
{{champion:150}} "Oogah bagah?"
{{champion:75}} "***SQUIRREL!***"
{{champion:9}} throws his crow, but {{champion:150}} promptly eats it

D:

Bwahaha.

{{champion:150}} throws his boomerang just for fun, but then it doesn't come back, so {{champion:150}} goes to look for it but when he walks into a bush, he see's{{champion:75}} holding it in his mouth.
i see gnar running around and he sees zed shadow and he starts talking with it while zed is just face palming.

Oh my, that *deal with it* is awesome :D

looks like that was

**puts on sunglasses**

a bright idea

Yessss, this one keeps cracking me up. >_< 

That first panel, Gnar's all "Oh, hey. what's up?"

Love it!
I'd like to see Gnar trying to catch {{champion:22}} 's arrows, or maybe spinning like {{champion:86}}
Competing with {{champion:15}} to see who's best at the whole boomerang blade/throw thing.

How about one with {{champion:117}} where he keeps trying to get Pix.

Or he comes out In Mega-Gnar and {{champion:117}} whimsy's him to normal Gnar.
Gnar is jumping on Zac like a trampoline and he is just like "no problem little guy, have fun"
These are amazing! I'd love to see Gnar riding on Jinx's super mega death rocket. :D
i could see Lux and Gnar playing flashlight tag or something. these are really cute!
Ahhh that would be cute!! :D Dawww...
lulu ulting herself and then gnar copying her by transforming!

If {{champion:150}} and {{champion:201}} hung out, Gnar would try to pet the poros in holy awe like little kids do with puppies. If it was with Dragonslayer {{champion:201}}, he would be trying to open {{champion:102}}'s jaws like a lion tamer.

Ahahaha these are good :D 

I did do a sketch of one comic where Gnar sees a bunch of Poros following Braum and then goes and tries to eat one. But I'm like OK NOPE THIS WILL PROBABLY NOT BE APPROVED and deleted it XD
Why have I been cursed with the inability to upvote such adorable-ness more than once?! O^O

know what I wanna see.... Swain, using Gnar as his bird {{champion:50}}

also the Rengar/Malzahar one is my favorite.
Gnar Pretending to be a super cool Ninja like Kennen!
